title: New Ashe
body:
Old Ashe:
Auto attacks slow you
Builds crit passively
Volley
Big stun arrow

New Ashe:
Double attacks attack speed mega crits pew pew pew pew pew
Volley
Big stun arrow

replies.body: I should just replace her passive tooltip with this image.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q6yekLPA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-12T03:53:49.608+0000)
>
> I should just replace her passive tooltip with this image.

It would only be a start to explain why she pew pew pews.

"big crits"

cannot normally crit and has reduced crit dmg

lol
Derivatives are actually really easy to understand. You'll learn them senior year of high school (or junior if you're smart).

> [{quoted}](name=The AFK Farmer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q6yekLPA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-12T01:56:20.130+0000)
>
> Derivatives (that are actually really easy to understand. You'll learn them senior year of high school (or junior if you're smart).

Nope, I learned them 10 years after high school. 

I'm just drunk and got owned by an Ashe and went to look at her lolwiki and I was like wtf is this. Similar to the first time you see calculus you're like wtf is this.
Ah. Yeah, I hate new Ashe. She feels really underwhelming to play as and frustrating to play against.
